title: Matt Bishop: 'Juan Pablo Montoya raced on gut instinct. It was sublime - when it worked'
summary: When Juan Pablo Montoya gets into a car, people sit up and take notice, from F1 to IndyCar and NASCAR to IMSA. As the gifted, instinctive racer turns 50, is there still time for one more dazzling drive?

qa_pairs.question: Which racing series did Juan Pablo Montoya compete in besides Formula 1?
What characteristic is Juan Pablo Montoya particularly known for in his racing style?
At what age did Juan Pablo Montoya recently turn 50?
